org.lenskit.util.collections

Class LongUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.util.collections.LongUtils

  • @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public final class LongUtils
extends Object

    Utilities for working with longs and collections of them from Fastutil.

    Since:
    2.0
    Compatibility
    Public

    • Method Detail

      • frozenMap

        public static Long2DoubleSortedMap frozenMap(Map<Long,Double> map)

        Create a frozen long-to-double map. This effectively creates a copy of a map, but if the provided map is an instance of Long2DoubleSortedArrayMap, which is immutable, it is returned as-is for efficiency.

        Parameters:
        map - The source map.
        Returns:
        An immutable map with the same data as map.

      • frozenSet

        public static LongSortedSet frozenSet(Collection<Long> longs)

        Create a frozen long set. If the underlying collection is already an immutable sorted set (specifically, a LongSortedArraySet, it is used as-is. Otherwise, it is copied into a sorted array set.

        Parameters:
        longs - The collection.
        Returns:
        The sorted array set.

      • packedSet

        public static LongSortedSet packedSet(Collection<Long> longs)

        Pack longs into a sorted set.

        Parameters:
        longs - A collection of longs.
        Returns:
        An efficient sorted set containing the numbers in longs.

      • packedSet

        public static LongSortedSet packedSet(long... longs)

        Pack longs into a sorted set.

        Parameters:
        longs - An array of longs. This array is copied, not wrapped.
        Returns:
        An efficient sorted set containing the numbers in longs.

      • keyValueComparator

        public static LongComparator keyValueComparator(Long2DoubleFunction vals)

        Create a comparator that compares long keys by associated double values.

        Parameters:
        vals - The value map.
        Returns:
        A comparator that will compare keys by looking them up in a map.

      • asLongCollection

        public static LongCollection asLongCollection(Collection<Long> longs)

        Get a Fastutil LongCollection from a Collection of longs. This method simply casts the collection, if possible, and returns a wrapper otherwise.

        Parameters:
        longs - A collection of longs.
        Returns:
        The collection as a LongCollection.

      • asLong2DoubleFunction

        public static Long2DoubleFunction asLong2DoubleFunction(Map<Long,Double> map)

        Create a long-to-double function from a map, casting if appropriate. Useful to allow unboxed access to maps that are really fastutil maps.

        Parameters:
        map - The map.
        Returns:
        A function backed by map, or map if it is a Fastutil map.

      • asLongList

        public static LongList asLongList(List<Long> longs)

      • constantDoubleMap

        public static Long2DoubleMap constantDoubleMap(Set<Long> keys,
                                               double value)

        Create a map that maps a group of items to the same value.

        Parameters:
        keys - The keys.
        value - The value.
        Returns:
        A map that contains all keys, mapping each of them to value.

      • asLongSet

        public static LongSet asLongSet(@Nullable
                                Set<Long> longs)

        Get a Fastutil LongSet from a Set of longs.

        Parameters:
        longs - The set of longs.
        Returns:
        longs as a fastutil LongSet. If longs is already a LongSet, it is cast.

      • asLongSet

        public static LongSet asLongSet(@Nullable
                                Collection<Long> longs)

        Get a Fastutil LongSet from a Collection of longs.

        Parameters:
        longs - The set of longs.
        Returns:
        longs as a fastutil LongSet. If longs is already a LongSet, it is cast.

      • itemRanks

        public static Long2IntMap itemRanks(LongList results)

        Compute the ranks for a list of longs.

        Parameters:
        results - The list of longs.
        Returns:
        The map of ranks; its default return value will be -1.

      • setDifference

        public static LongSortedSet setDifference(LongSet items,
                                          LongSet exclude)

        Compute the set difference of two sets.

        Parameters:
        items - The initial set
        exclude - The items to remove
        Returns:
        The elements of items that are not in exclude.

      • intersectSize

        public static int intersectSize(LongSortedSet a,
                                LongSortedSet b)

        Compute the size of the intersection of two sets.

        Parameters:
        a - The first set.
        b - The second set.
        Returns:
        The size of the intersection of the two sets.

      • hasNCommonItems

        public static boolean hasNCommonItems(LongSortedSet a,
                                      LongSortedSet b,
                                      int n)

        Check if two sets have at least a given number of common items.

        Parameters:
        a - The first set.
        b - The second set.
        n - The number of common items to require.
        Returns:
        true if the two sets have at least n common items.

        Parameters:

        b - The second set.
        Returns:

        Compute the union of two sets.

        Parameters:

        b - The second set.
        Returns:

                                         LongSet b)

        Compute the intersection of two sets.

        Parameters:
        a - The first set.
        b - The second set.
        Returns:
        The elements present in both sets.

        public static LongSortedSet setIntersect(LongSortedSet a,
                                         LongSortedSet b)

        Compute the intersection of two sets.

        Parameters:

        b - The second set.
        Returns:
        The elements present in both sets.

      • randomSubset

        public static LongSet randomSubset(LongSet set,
                                   int num,
                                   Random random)

        Selects a random subset of n longs from a given set of longs. If fewer than n items can be selected the whole set is returned.

        Parameters:
        set - the set of items to select from
        num - The number of random items to add.
        random - a random number generator to be used.
        Returns:
        An item selector that selects the items selected by base plus an additional nRandom items.

      • randomSubset

        public static LongSortedSet randomSubset(LongSet set,
                                         int num,
                                         LongSet exclude,
                                         Random rng)

        Selects a random subset of n longs from a given set of longs such that no selected items is in a second set of longs. If fewer than n items can be selected the whole set is returned.

        Parameters:
        set - the set of items to select from
        num - The number of random items to add.
        exclude - a set of longs which must not be returned
        rng - a random number generator to be used.
        Returns:
        An item selector that selects the items selected by base plus an additional nRandom items.
